answers.answer: This is a very complex issue and requires the advice of a haematologist. It is NOT as simple as ingesting more iron or changing the diet. There are numerous possible reasons for an abnormal hematocrit.

question: my momm she is 47 year old  her hemoglobin is below normal and she is also diabetic from quiet a long timeSo please suggest a diet for her to get normal hemoglobin without increasing her diabetes
title: how to increase hemoglobin
